scripts.build: npm run clean && bundle exec jekyll build --verbose && gulp
scripts.dev: npm run clean && bundle exec jekyll build --drafts --verbose --watch & NODE_ENV=development gulp --watch & browser-sync start --server=public --files=public/**/*.{html,js,css,jpg,jpeg,gif,png,svg,ogv,mp4} --no-open --no-notify --logLevel=info --port=${PORT:-3000}
scripts.prod: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && npm start
